### Tender Announcement - Meat, Fish, and Poultry 6th Period
# Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of Meat, Fish, and Poultry products for the 6th period. This solicitation is a request for Standing Offer and is open to all qualified suppliers.

## Details
- ** Solicitation Reference Number**: WS3930664986
- **Title**: EC095-230005 RMSO Meat, Fish, and Poultry 6th period
- **Classification of Products**: Meat and poultry products, minimally processed, and processed products (*50110000, *50111500, *50112000 UN/SPSC)
- **Method of Contracting**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Service Delivery Areas**: Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada, Nova Scotia, and New Brunswick

## Important Dates
- **Publication Date**: 2023-12-20
- ** Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-20T14:00:00
- **Contract Start Date**: 2023-05-01
- **Contract End Date**: 2023-10-31

## Contact Information
For more information, please log in to SAP Ariba to view the opportunity: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15977444

Contact:
- **Name**: MacFarlane, Andrew (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email**: andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: Please log in to SAP Ariba to view the full opportunity and to submit your proposal.
